text: Nae Lăzărescu (8 September 1941 - 19 December 2013) was a Romanian television, stage and movie actor. He was also a comedian. He was born in Bucharest. His career began in 1963. Lăzărescu died of chronic liver disease, in Bucharest. He was aged 72.Nae Lăzărescu a murit. "În comedie trebuie să ai luciditate şi har. Asta avea Nae" He will be buried on 21 December in Focșani, Vrancea County.Nae Lăzărescu a murit. title: Nae Lăzărescu
